alert_to_change_lanauge.message: add ?hl=en at the end of the URL. For example, https://meet.google.com/ccc-cccc-ccc?hl=en

alart_to_notify_no_pending_transcript.message:
No text in caption.
Press when immediate transcript is available.

alart_to_notify_pending_transcript.message: Please choose a word to record for study log, or press Esc to cancel logging.

realtime_caption_to_send_to_log.message: Choose a word to record as unrecognized one

realtime_caption_notify_the_option.message: Unrecognized words recording option can be turned on via option settings

show_stats_option.message: Statistics such as turn taking ratio can be turned on via option settings

show_option_feedback.message: Feedback such as applause to use a designated phrase can be turned on Receive feedback via option settings

record_log.message: You have chosen $action$ to record as log

record_to_review.message: Text $word$ recorded as a word to review

alart_to_ask_to_answer_the_prompt.message: Select an option to answer the question

prompt_during_edit.message:
Drag areas to move color-filled areas. Click the setting icon again to freeze the adjusted positions. Hold down control key to change the right edge and the bottom edge.
Disable Show unrecognize word option. Otherwise, the section is locked and you can't move

oauth_notify_soon_to_be_expired.message: Authenticatation is about to expire. Authenticate yourself

oauth_not_verified_on_server.message: Authenticatation is not verified on server. You need to authenticate again. Authenticate yourself?

server_not_reached_with_errors.message: Error issued when the extension is trying to receive response from your analytics server. Access your analytics server (click here) to see if the server is up and running.

google_speech_to_text_prompt.message: Browser built-in caption will use Google's speech to text. Please press OK to accept privacy policy of Web Speech API explained at URL:https://www.google.com/chrome/privacy/whitepaper.html#speech under the section named Speech to text.

google_speech_to_text_approved.message: You have accepted privacy statement of Google speech to text. Live caption has started.

google_speech_to_text_rejected.message: You have rejected privacy statement of Google speech to text. Live caption is not initiated.

confirm_destination_security.message: Read the document about security risk in the link marked as ? above the URL input field. Choose OK to accept the choice and to consent to the conditions highlighted in the document.

confirm_destination_rejected.message: You rejected the new URL value. The option screen will close without saving new values.
